text: Russia is holding its biggest public
holiday the victory parade marking the
75th anniversary of the defeat of Nazi
Germany in World War two despite a
growing number of coronavirus infections
the parade is usually held on May the
9th but was delayed because of the
pandemic this year's event holds special
significance for President Putin because
in a week's time Russia will hold a
constitutional vote which could allow
him to stay in power until 2036 our
correspondent Steve Rosenberg has been
watching the event in Red Square
